idea-plugin.name: Design Pattern Generator
idea-plugin.description: Design Pattern Generator is an excellent IntelliJ IDEA plugin that aids developers in generating code for a total of 24 design patterns, including the 23 classic patterns and Simple Factory pattern. It's easy to use and convenient with templates for each pattern, making the implementation of these design patterns more straightforward and less time-consuming. This plugin is beneficial for developers of all experience levels who aim to efficiently apply design patterns in their projects.
